entry.summary:

  • In-ear earphones hands-free with mic
  • Powerful bass-driven stereo sound
  • Universally compatible for use with other devices that have a 3.5mm connector or jack
  • Weight 14g
  • Cable length : 120cm
  • The headphone's housing is crafted from sturdy aluminum, which prevents vibration for the purest sound performance. In addition, it protects the earphones from the wear and tear of everyday use.
  • The smart anti-tangle slider helps you easily keep the two earpiece cables neatly together, simply by gliding it up. No more hassles with tangles or knots!
  • Neodymium is the ideal material for producing a strong magnetic field for greater sensitivity in a voice coil, better bass response, and higher overall sound quality. It features re-engineered 8.6-mm neodymium drivers that are responsive to high frequencies and ensure pure sound clarity.
  • Your in-ear headphones are precisely designed to fit any ear. Their ergonomic oval sound tube and curved architecture ensure an optimized, secure, and comfortable fit – always.
